string.value: Andy has requested that you travel to the ruins of the city in the year 2216 and defeat Aufheben, the central robot that controls all electronic devices in the city. Andy says if Dunas was an android, it is very likely that Aufheben is also an android.

Andy requested that you travel to the ruins of the city in the year 2216 and defeat Aufheben, the central robot that controlled all electronic devices in the city. As suspected, Aufheben was an android. The battle between humans and robots seems interminable.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 170,000\r\nCan participate in the "Nex the Time Guard" quest.\r\n

The purpose of this next time travel is to defeat Aufheben. Aufheben is the name of the central robot that began controlling all electronic devices after the City Center was bombed. Since Dunas was an android, it is quite likely that Aufheben is also an android. Do you think you can defeat Aufheben?
Aufheben is strong beyond your imagination. It won't be easy destroying Aufheben. Best wishes.
Are you not ready? Now, that's a problem. We don't have much time left.
You're getting stronger and stronger. I can't believe you've defeated Aufheben. You are a true hero and an incredible time traveler.
Please defeat Aufheben, the central robot that controls all electronic devices in town. That might be the last step to changing the past and setting things right.
